00034 KHLABoloSysRecord& KHLABoloSysRecord::operator=(const KHLABoloSysRecord &aRec)
00035 {
00036         if(&aRec == this) return *this;
00037         
00038         this->KBoloSystemRecord::operator=(aRec);

00041         
00042         return *this;
00043 }

00057 void KHLABoloSysRecord::Clear(Option_t *anOption)
00058 {
00059         //Clear the base classes and then clear/delete any local
00060   //members. Its necessary for this Clear method to exist
00061   //in the case that instances of this object are stored
00062   //inside of a TClonesArray
00063   //Also, if this class holds any TClonesArrays, it must call
00064   //TClonesArray::Clear("C")
00065         KBoloSystemRecord::Clear(anOption);
00066         
00067   //Clear and delete local objects here. 
00068         
00069   //Re initialize local members here and prepare for the next use of this class.
00070   InitializeMembers();
00071         
00072 }

00081 Bool_t KHLABoloSysRecord::IsSame(const KHLABoloSysRecord &aRec, Bool_t bPrint) const
00082 {
00083         //Compares two objects and their member variables to test for equality.
00084         //If bPrint is set to true, then a message for each member variable that is different
00085         //will print to standard out. Otherwise, this method will return false and quit
00086         //checking member variables as soon as it finds a unequal data member.
00087         
00088         Bool_t bIsEqual = true; //assume its true, then test for differences
00089         
00090         //call the base class's IsSame methods
00091         if(!this->KBoloSystemRecord::IsSame(aRec,bPrint)){
00092                 bIsEqual = false;
00093                 if(!bPrint)
00094                         return false;  //if we're not printing out, just return false at first failure
00095                 //the operator== method uses this functionality.
00096         }
00097         
00098                 
00099         return bIsEqual;
00100         
00101 }

00103 void KHLABoloSysRecord::Compact(void)
00104 {
00105         //make the event class as small as possible. this calls 'Compact' for all member
00106         //variables that are KDS classes, member variables that can be compacted (such as TBits)
00107         //and base classes
00108         
00109         KBoloSystemRecord::Compact();
00110         
00111 }
